name: Tron Project
description:
This is a school project made by 3 students.

The project had to be multiplayer( 2- 4 players) so the project is only playable with controllers.

All the 3D objets are made by us.

We had to make the player feel the speed, for this we used patterns, speed lines(VFX) and presence of static elements (pillars) for this.
